messages.content:
Although Erik Erikson's stages of psychosocial development are sequential, the search for identity that begins in the stage of identity versus role confusion: 

c. ends with the stage of generativity versus stagnation

a. is ongoing throughout adulthood

b. ends with the stage of intimacy versus isolation

d. comes to fruition only after the stage of integrity versus despair

Middle-aged Robert and his adolescent son are sitting at the table reading the newspaper. Robert is holding his section of the newspaper rather far from his eyes. His son asks, "Dad, why are you holding the paper so far away? If I held it that far away, I could not read anything!" Robert replies, "I think it is because I am developing:
Group of answer choices

a. nearsightedness

d. macular degeneration

c. presbycusis

b. auditory degeneration
